citations.narrative:
The primary enclosures, for the one rabbit housed in the barn and the 3 rabbits housed outdoors, had a significant
accumulation of feces on the floors. Some had been frozen to the floor of the outdoor enclosures, due to the weather.
Excreta shall be removed from primary enclosures on a more frequent basis to prevent accumulations and contamination
of the rabbits housed there in.
Primary enclosures shall be kept reasonably free of excreta, hair, cobwebs and other debris by periodic cleaning.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: FEBRUARY 28, 2024.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.56(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
The primary enclosures, for the one rabbit housed in the barn and the 3 rabbits housed outdoors, had a significant 
accumulation of feces on the floors. Some had been frozen to the floor of the outdoor enclosures, due to the weather. 
Excreta shall be removed from primary enclosures on a more frequent basis to prevent accumulations and contamination 
of the rabbits housed there in.  
 
Primary enclosures shall be kept reasonably free of excreta, hair, cobwebs and other debris by periodic cleaning. 
 
TO BE CORRECTED BY: FEBRUARY 28, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
